channel.title: RSCDv25 Help wanted making myself admin on forums and in game pl0x :]
channel.description:
Hello i require some help making myself admin on my forums and in game please :] im using rscdv25 piru online(dq) source... i have my forums set up with an account and have an in game account i just need to know how to make myself admin. im sure its rly easy but if anyone can help it would be much appreciated.
i was also wondering if someone could tell me how to make the client so i can send it to my freinds for them to play.
THANKS ALOT!!!!!!! xo <3

item.title: RSCDv25 Help wanted making myself admin on forums and in game pl0x :]
item.dc:creator: @aviv3 aviv3
item.description:
@aviv3 wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:4, topic:267037”][quote author=adu link=topic=352567.msg2704237#msg2704237 date=1236872431]
In Game Admin - Goto to phpadmin, click on rscd_player on the left, find your name, click the pencil like thing next to your name, change rank from whatever it is to 1 for admin, 2 for mod, hit save and your done

Fourm Admin - Same step as above but instead of cliking on rscd_player, goto users on the left side.

I don’t know what the heck your talking about “making a client so other people can play”.

[/quote]
Are you not sick of helping people that can’t read a simple TuT? Point them to ‘Read befor post’[/quote]
oi faggetface ive already read the tut and set up portforwarding… if ur not gons come in this thread to help me then get the fuck off u hostile little jew. kthx

adu thx for your help :] much appreciated

Read full topic
item.source: RSCDv25 Help wanted making myself admin on forums and in game pl0x :]

item.title: RSCDv25 Help wanted making myself admin on forums and in game pl0x :]
item.dc:creator: @froggie froggie
item.description:
@froggie wrote:

Pl0x is the best term ever.

By making the client so other people can play would be in reference to binding the world server to his public IP so that other players can connect. Best way to do that is either set the world.xml where it has the server IP as 0.0.0.0 OR do start> run> type CMD and press enter> type ipconfig and press enter > find where it has your internal IP address (should be something like 192.168.1.xxx and copy what you read on your computer into the world.xml where the server IP is. You may also need to do port forwarding for port 43594. Google how to do that.

Read full topic
item.source: RSCDv25 Help wanted making myself admin on forums and in game pl0x :]

Fourm Admin - Same step as above but instead of cliking on rscd_player, goto users on the left side.

I don’t know what the heck your talking about “making a client so other people can play”.
